resources.string: Tap the map to mark the center of the geofence. Drag the blue marker at the edge of the circle to adjust it\'s radius. Tap \'Add Geofences\' to add your geofences to the list of areas that will trigger a BID report upon entering/leaving them.
This sample demonstrates how to launch a Blackberry Integrity Detection (BID) report when the user enters or exits a specified geofence.
